problem_summary_simple: Determine the sign of the product of all numbers in an array.
problem_summary_technical: Iterates through the array, tracking the count of negative numbers and returning 0 immediately if a zero is found.
key_insights: The sign of a product is determined by the parity of negative numbers.
Encountering a zero immediately makes the product zero, short-circuiting the calculation.
XORing a flag with 1 efficiently toggles between positive and negative sign states.
